payload.sql:
SELECT a.attname, format_type(a.atttypid, a.atttypmod),
       pg_get_expr(d.adbin, d.adrelid), a.attnotnull, a.atttypid, a.atttypmod,
       c.collname, col_description(a.attrelid, a.attnum) AS comment
  FROM pg_attribute a
  LEFT JOIN pg_attrdef d ON a.attrelid = d.adrelid AND a.attnum = d.adnum
  LEFT JOIN pg_type t ON a.atttypid = t.oid
  LEFT JOIN pg_collation c ON a.attcollation = c.oid AND a.attcollation <> t.typcollation
 WHERE a.attrelid = '"purchase_data"'::regclass
   AND a.attnum > 0 AND NOT a.attisdropped
 ORDER BY a.attnum
payload.name: SCHEMA

payload.sql:
SELECT a.attname
  FROM (
         SELECT indrelid, indkey, generate_subscripts(indkey, 1) idx
           FROM pg_index
          WHERE indrelid = '"purchase_order_data"'::regclass
            AND indisprimary
       ) i
  JOIN pg_attribute a
    ON a.attrelid = i.indrelid
   AND a.attnum = i.indkey[i.idx]
 ORDER BY i.idx
payload.name: SCHEMA

payload.sql:
SELECT purchase_divisions.purchase_division_long_name, supplier_masters.supplier_name,
          purchase_order_data.purchase_order_code, SUM(purchase_data.purchase_amount)  FROM "purchase_data" INNER JOIN "purchase_order_data" ON "purchase_order_data"."id" = "purchase_data"."purchase_order_datum_id" INNER JOIN "supplier_masters" ON "supplier_masters"."id" = "purchase_data"."supplier_id" INNER JOIN "purchase_divisions" ON "purchase_divisions"."id" = "purchase_data"."division_id" WHERE "purchase_data"."construction_datum_id" = $1 ORDER BY purchase_data.division_id, purchase_order_data.purchase_order_code
